events.name: game_state
events.comment: The current state of the game. start, fishing, market, bills, sleep, end, transition

events.name: market_open_time
events.comment: when the market opens in hours

events.name: market_close_time
events.comment: when the market closes in hours

actions.text: set bill prices, market prices, reset all required values. ->start
start in idle state, move to location, fish for 10-20 ingame mins

parameters.value: Fish_Demand1 * fish_price1 + Fish_Demand2 * fish_price2 + Fish_Demand3 * fish_price3

actions.text: show new mental state, hunger state, and energy level

parameters.text: "Fish Caught: " & fish_caught  & newline &"Fish Sold: " & (fish_caught - fish_amount1 - fish_amount2 - fish_amount3)
